short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: yet another NEO thin wallet for chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NeoOffLine is based on NeoLine, equipped with the following features:

- public key only wallet
    - THE MOST IMPORTANT FEATURE TO PROTECT YOUR CRYPTOS
    - create a wallet by its public key and store your private keys offline;
    - when signatures are required, the extension will ask you to sign and provide them;
- zero priority gas fee by default

note:

- do NOT install NeoOffLine and NeoLine together
- although all the features from NeoLine are supported, it is NOT recommended to `generate new wallet` or `import a PRIVATE key` or `use the wallet on Neo2`
- USE AT YOUR OWN RISK, see source code https://github.com/neo-off-line/extension
- potential bugs from NeoLine can also be introduced to NeoOffline

supported offline key management tools:

- https://github.com/neo-off-line/neo-off-line.github.io
- https://github.com/hardenedtomb/ht

acknowledgement:

- NeoLine (MIT Licence)
long.zh_CN:
another NEO thin wallet for chrome extension, no need to import your secret private key into extension, you can import the public key only and sign your transaction offline

when you need to send a transaction, this extension will prompt you the transaction and you could paste the signature signed by your offline wallet

it's also OK to use this extension as a watch-only account
